title: The Kalyani Grandeur: Diamond & Emerald Bridal Haaram
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut diamonds (VS clarity
G color) and vibrant green Emeralds. Lustrous South Sea Pearls add a touch of grace. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: A majestic Haaram featuring a cascading floral design. Each flower motif is intricately crafted and embellished with diamonds. The emeralds are gracefully placed to accentuate the diamond's brilliance. The design incorporates delicate pearl drops along the top row. This piece showcases a modern take on traditional South Indian necklace designs.
colors: Dominant gold with dazzling white diamonds
complemented by the lush green of the emeralds and the soft white of the pearls.
occasions: Perfect for a grand wedding reception
or any occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for modern cocktail events and high-profile gatherings.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and pearls creates a luxurious and sophisticated look. A true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations, embodying both cultural heritage and contemporary style.
